title:
NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) - FOLLOW-UP FORM B1: EVALUATION FORM - PHYSICAL
INSTRUCTIONS
description: This form is to be completed by the clinician. For additional clarification and examples, see UDSCoding Guidebook for Follow-up Visit Packet, Form B1. Link to NACC Coding Guidebook Check only one box perquestion.

fu_bpsys.title: 3a. Subject blood pressure at initial reading (sitting), systolic

fu_bpdias.title: 3b. Subject blood pressure at initial reading (sitting), diastolic

fu_vision.title: 5. Without corrective lenses, is the subject's vision functionally normal?

fu_viscorr.title: 6. Does the subject usually wear corrective lenses? (If no or unknown, SKIP TO QUESTION 7)

fu_viswcorr.title: 6a. If yes, is the subject's vision functionally normal with corrective lenses?

fu_hearing.title: 7. Without a hearing aid(s), is the subject's hearing functionally normal?

fu_hearaid.title: 8. Does the subject usually wear a hearing aid(s)? (If no or unknown, END FORM HERE)

fu_hearwaid.title: 8a. If yes, is the subject's hearing functionally normal with a hearing aid(s)?
